name: claytonerrington.com
description: Source code for Clayton Errington's Website
author: Clayton Errington

scripts.uglify: uglifyjs assets/js/vendor/jquery/jquery-3.5.1.js assets/js/plugins/jquery.fitvids.js assets/js/plugins/jquery.greedy-navigation.js assets/js/plugins/jquery.magnific-popup.js assets/js/plugins/jquery.ba-throttle-debounce.js assets/js/plugins/smooth-scroll.js assets/js/plugins/gumshoe.js assets/js/_main.js -c -m -o assets/js/main.min.js
scripts.build:js: npm run uglify && npm run add-banner
scripts.ssl: bundle exec jekyll serve --ssl-key ssl/localhost.key --ssl-cert ssl/localhost.crt
scripts.dev: bundle exec jekyll serve jekyll serve --drafts
